subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: From Tokyo to Oakland to Toronto and finally to Fenway Park, Red Sox players were relieved to be home after a 19-day journey that ended with a three-game sweep by the Blue Jays.
snippet: From Tokyo to Oakland to Toronto and finally to Fenway Park, Red Sox players were relieved to be home after a 19-day journey that ended with a three-game sweep by the Blue Jays.
